call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - January 30th

decisions.decision: Community town hall scheduled for February 4th at 4 p.m. UTC
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.context: To discuss monetary innovation aspects in Ergo Core protocol and ecosystem
decisions.quote: All right, so next Tuesday will be February 4th. Yeah, so let's meet our community town hall and discuss different well, monetary innovation aspects we have in the Ergo Core protocol and the ecosystem.

commitments.commitment: Release public testnet for 6.0 after fixing all found issues
commitments.quote: Then, yeah, well, all the issues found in 6.0 are fixed. So I'm going for public testnet release.

commitments.commitment: Final audit and mainnet warning and activation for 6.0
commitments.quote: And then, yeah, well, final audit and we are good for mainnet warning and activation.

commitments.commitment: Provide 6.0 jar file and config instructions for testnet
commitments.quote: All right. So yeah, I will just provide you a 6.0 jar. And yeah, you will need to put, well, one value in a config file.

commitments.commitment: Announce the community town hall on Twitter
commitments.quote: No, let me do that today. Why don't you announce it in person right here and then we'll announce it on Twitter later.

open_questions.question: Identity of current testnet miner
open_questions.context: kushti trying to find who is currently mining the testnet

open_questions.question: Synchronization between DEX front-end and back-end developers
open_questions.context: Difficulty getting UI and main deployments done due to lack of sync

reversals_or_updates.update: qx() confirmed as the single testnet miner
reversals_or_updates.reason: qx() checked his testnet miner during the call
reversals_or_updates.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Sigmanauts recently collected 14 ERGs from storage rent
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: $20,000 worth of liquidity in ERG/PHP token picked up by storage rent
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Ergo launched in 2019 and is still the only blockchain with storage rent
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: SigmaUSD Oracle pool has 4 or 5 participants with maximum possible of 12
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Gold Oracle pools have exactly 20 operators maximum with 14-18 currently online
key_facts.speaker: kushti
